text: American singer-songwriter Gracie Abrams has released two studio albums, two live albums, three extended plays (EP), and 23 singles, including one as a featured artist. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== Title Album details Peak chart positions Certifications US AUS Peaks in Australia: * All except noted: * "Risk": * "I Love You, I'm Sorry": * "That's So True": CAN GER IRE NLD NZ Peaks in New Zealand: * Good Riddance: * The Secret of Us: SWE SWI Peaks in Switzerland: * Good Riddance: * The Secret of Us: UK Good Riddance * Released: February 24, 2023 * Label: Interscope * Formats: CD, LP, digital download, streaming 52 30 55 19 4 — 40 — 92 3 The Secret of Us * Released: June 21, 2024 * Label: Interscope * Formats: CD, LP, digital download, streaming 2 1 1 3 2 1 2 8 5 1 * BPI: Gold * MC: Platinum * RMNZ: Gold "—" denotes an album that did not chart or was not released in that territory. ===Extended plays=== Title Details Peak chart positions US Heat.
